5.4.1.6. eqcorrscan.utils.clustering.dist_mat_km¶

eqcorrscan.utils.clustering.dist_mat_km(catalog)[source]¶

Compute the distance matrix for all a catalog using epicentral separation.

Will give physical distance in kilometers.

Parameters:catalog (obspy.core.event.Catalog) – Catalog for which to compute the distance matrix
Returns:distance matrix
Return type:numpy.ndarray
